description:
In the wake of Donald Trump’s electoral victory early Wednesday morning, climate policy in the U.S. enters an uncertain new era. Some themes are already apparent: Trump has pledged to scale up domestic fossil fuel production while making a broader push to deregulate industry. He also seems intent on scaling back the Inflation Reduction Act, […]

The post Climate Deniers Waiting in the Wings as Trump Reclaims Presidency appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Climate Deniers Waiting in the Wings as Trump Reclaims Presidency
